name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [1]
location: Purchased from Merchant Kalé for 500 Runes. Kalé is located in: Limgrave, Church of Elleh.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [2]
location: Purchased from Merchant Kalé for 500 Runes. Kalé is located in: Limgrave, Church of Elleh.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [3]
location: Purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in North Limgrave for 600 Runes.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [4]
location: Obtained in the south of Mistwood. Found on a corpse at the side of the road close to the Siofra River Well.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [5]
location: Purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in East Limgrave for 1500 Runes.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [6]
location: Looted from the dead body in the room at the top of the main stairs of Fort Haight.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [7]
location: It's found at the very edge of the collapsed bridge next of Stormveil Castle, crossing it from Stormhill. Held by a dead man sitting there. There's no big risk to fall as there is ground below and the fall is non-lethal.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [8]
location: Looted off a corpse found inside Tombsward Cave.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [9]
location: Found inside Tombsward Catacombs in Weeping Peninsula. Sealed behind an Imp Statue barrier. Requires a Stonesword Key to break the seal.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [10]
location: On a dead body in Stormveil Castle. From Rampart Tower (Site of Grace), head out the north door. Jump to the roof immediately visible to the east. Follow the right ledge, then jump down to the level with the 2 enemies (optional combat). Cross the bridge, the recipe is on the corpse directly ahead guarded by 2 weak enemies.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [11]
location: Purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for 1,500 Runes.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [12]
location: Found at Rose Church, along the southern walls.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [13]
location: Purchased from the Nomadic Merchant located in Liurnia of the Lakes for 2,000 Runes.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [14]
location: Found on one of the two corpses in the Smoldering Church.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [15]
location: Purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in south Caelid for 4,000 Runes.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [16]
location: Purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Ainsel River for 2,500 Runes.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [17]
location: Purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Siofra River for 1,000 Runes.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [18]
location: Purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Siofra River for 6,000 Runes.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [19]
location: Found on the ground inside of the smaller ruined building at Woodfolk Ruins in Altus Plateau.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [20]
location: Purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for 3000 Runes.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [21]
location: Found inside the Volcano Manor, going upstairs when you enter the hallway from the lobby, enter the first door to the right, the same one with the corpse with a Perfume Bottle. Follow the path through a room full of Snails and you'll end up with a room with two ways forward - one down a flight of steps, another through an open doorway to your left. Head left first, being wary of Snails that may ambush you and continue until you reach a dead end. The corpse at the end of this passageway has the *cookbook* on it, and to the left of it, reveal another hidden door that opens up into a room with the Depraved Perfumer Carmaan Ashes.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [22]
location: Found in a chest in a ruin in the western section of the Lake of Rot.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [23]
location: Found in Consecrated Snowfield: Follow the road north and past the first Site of Grace (Consecrated Snowfield), it will be on a corpse just by the road.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [24]
location: Mohgwyn Palace: Found on a corpse by the edge of the cliffs southeast of the blood marsh. From the Palace Approach Ledge-Road Site of Grace, head north down into the blood swamp, hugging the left wall. Once you reach a large open area, you should see a Golden Tree on a ledge above you, jump onto this rock and you will see a giant crow enemy, the corpse where this cookbook is found is resting on the cliff nearby.

name: Armorer's Cookbook [1]
location: Found in a Kaiden Sellsword camp North-East of the Agheel Lake North Site of Grace in Limgrave.

name: Armorer's Cookbook [2]
location: Purchased from the Nomadic Merchant for 600 Runes. He is located south-east of Coastal Cave.

name: Armorer's Cookbook [3]
location: Purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in East Limgrave for 2000 Runes.

name: Armorer's Cookbook [4]
location: Found in Redmane Castle in the northwestern gate house.

name: Armorer's Cookbook [5]
location: Found in Redmane Castle. Through a door in the southwest, past a room with an assassin enemy is an outdoors area with a ladder and a door to the right. The cookbook is in the room to the right. Please note that the doors in Redmane Castle open only after defeating the Misbegotten Warrior & Crucible Knight bosses.

name: Armorer's Cookbook [6]
location: Found on a corpse in Siofra River sitting by a cliff's edge, next to some enemies. To get there warp to Grace Siofra River Bank. Jump up on the ledges behind you next to the pillar using Torrent, then follow the cliff to the west.

name: Armorer's Cookbook [7]
location: Found in Fort Laiedd, in western Mt. Gelmir, on the bottom floor once past the wooden door.

name: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [1]
location: Dropped by a Noble at an enemy outpost found following the way to the northwest of the Church of Irith.

name: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [2]
location: Found in a corpse just by the Laskyar Ruins Site of Grace.

name: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [3]
location: Highway Lookout Tower in eastern Liurnia. Found in a chest inside the tower.

name: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [4]
location: From the Academy Gate Town Site of Grace, head northwest and look for a sunken church building with enemies on the roof. The chest is located inside a tower that you can jump inside. Right next to the Academy Gate Town map icon on the left/west.

name: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [5]
location: Looted from a treasure chest inside a room. From the Schoolhouse Classroom site of Raya Lucaria Academy, go to the hallway, turn left.

name: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [6]
location: Caria Manor: Found in a small room southeast of the gardens.

name: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [7]
location: Purchased from Pidia, Carian Servant at Caria Manor.

name: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [8]
location: Found at Concecrated Grounds Southwest of Albinauric's Rise. There will be 3 Arcane Sphere of Faces encircling a corpse with the cookbook.

name: Missionary's Cookbook [1]
location: Purchased from Merchant Kalé for 1000 Runes. Kalé is located in: Limgrave, Church of Elleh.

name: Missionary's Cookbook [2]
location: Purchased from Patches for 800 Runes.

name: Missionary's Cookbook [3]
location: Found on one of the two corpses in the Smoldering Church.

name: Missionary's Cookbook [4]
location: Minor Erdtree Church, Capital area.

name: Missionary's Cookbook [5]
location: Found on a corpse in a circular section of the Siofra Aqueduct. From the Aqueduct-Facing Cliffs Site of Grace, head northeast out onto the cliff, drop down onto the diagonal beam and down the circular building. Across the bridge towards the southwest is a Crucible Knight enemy, the room behind him is where this cookbook is located.

name: Missionary's Cookbook [6]
location: Volcano Manor Region; From Temple of Eiglay Site of Grace, take the lift up and go outside, following the path and dropping down into the area with the lava and slugs. Cross the rock bridge and drop down onto a lower area on the left and continue up the path until you reach a large, open area of lava and a Pendulum Statue enemy. Jump through a window into a dark room and climb down the ladder near the door, continue down the stairs and the corpse with this cookbook Found behind a cell door.

name: Missionary's Cookbook [7]
location: Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 7,500 Runes.

name: Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [1]
location: Found in Wyndham Catacombs on a body in the room behind the rusted bars in the sewers. Can be reached by going under the raising floor in the room with the spike ceiling.

name: Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [2]
location: Purchased from a Mechant that you can found between Writheblood Ruins and The Minor Erdtree (Altus Plateau). The Merchant is near the Great Forest Spanning Bridge south of these two locations. To get here, go North of the Altus Highway Junction Grace, following the road.

name: Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [3]
location: Cathedral of Dragon Communion in southern Caelid. Found on a corpse tucked under the dragon's chest.

name: Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [4]
location: Found at the top roof of Crumbling Farum Azula. You will find the Cookbook after defeating the dragon, passing the building behind it.

name: Perfumer's Cookbook [1]
location: In the first chest when entering Perfumer's Ruins, NW of Abandoned Coffin site in Altus Plateau. Near the table where the Perfume Bottle is located.

name: Perfumer's Cookbook [2]
location: Found on a corpse sitting in a chair on one of the rooftops at The Shaded Castle, in Altus Plateau. From the Shaded Castle Inner Gate Site of Grace, head north and climb up the ladder on your left. Enter the dark library area and look for a ladder up, climb up to find the Cookbook.

name: Perfumer's Cookbook [3]
location: Auriza Side Tomb, open the transporter chest in the room with many benches. The room you'll be teleported to will have a corpse with *Perfumer's Cookbook [3] *on it.

name: Perfumer's Cookbook [4]
location: Purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Ainsel River for 3000 Runes.

name: Fevor's Cookbook [1]
location: Found on a corpse in the graveyard in a plateau south from Summonwater Village Outskirts.

name: Fevor's Cookbook [2]
location: Purchased from a merchant on the east path after entering the Academy of Raya Lucaria for 3,500 Runes.

name: Fevor's Cookbook [3]
location: Reward from Gideon Ofnir after visiting Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum

name: Frenzied's Cookbook [1]
location: Found on a body in one of the houses of the Frenzied Flame Village.

name: Frenzied's Cookbook [2]
location: Found nearest to the Cathedral of the Forsaken Site of Grace in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds below Leyndell, Royal Capital. Behind the altar in Mohg, the Omen's boss room is a hidden path which can be opened by attacking the altar behind the chest after the boss fight. Following the the hidden path, there are stairs down and will lead to collapsed rafters that you can cross; you can cross the path and follow the stairs down for a safer route, or drop directly below on second set of collapsed rafters. On the second set of rafters, you will need to drop down to the lowest set of them, and you will find the cookbook at a sitting corpse.
